attributes.action: Stop all COVID-19 restrictions. Return to life with no rules or restrictions.
attributes.additional_details: Stop all COVID restrictions. We have to accept that life lived, mental health, friendships, working, socialising, family and rebuilding our economy for security is more precious then saving lives. Death is part of life and always will be, death is understandable if we are free to live life to the fullest, be with the dying and fully embrace the grieving. I’d rather take my last breath dancing with my loved ones than spend another 6 months imprisoned with my face covered.
attributes.background: Stop all COVID restrictions. Let everyone live with freedom and not based on guess work that creates sensationalised fear.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

End lockdown to prevent further economic damage to the UK’s economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315979
